tool_description: Parses academic documents to extract structural elements, metadata, and content sections for further validation and analysis.

document_path.description: File path to the document to be parsed

document_format.description: Document format type: docx, pdf, tex, or txt

error_messages: File not found: Ensure the document_path points to an existing file.
Unsupported format: Use one of [docx, pdf, tex, txt].
Corrupted file: The document file appears to be damaged or unreadable.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to read the specified file.
usage: Provide document_path and document_format to parse the document. Optionally set extract_metadata to include document properties in the output.

word_count.description: Total word count of the document
